title: üì∞ World News Intelligence Pipeline
description: Fetch and analyze world news from top global sources using a reliable single-stage AI analysis pipeline with DuckDuckGo grounding, prioritizing source diversity.

source.title: News Category
source.description: Select the news category to collect from. Articles will be fetched from different sources within this category first.

customFeedUrl.title: Custom RSS Feed URL
customFeedUrl.description: Provide a custom RSS feed URL (if 'Custom' selected).

maxArticlesPerSource.title: Max Articles Per Source
maxArticlesPerSource.description: Maximum number of articles to scrape from each source URL listing.

maxArticles.title: Maximum Total Articles
maxArticles.description: Global limit on total articles fetches across all sources.

region.title: Search Region (DuckDuckGo)
region.description: Region to limit search results by (e.g., 'us-en' for US, 'wt-wt' for World).

runTestMode.title: Admin Test Mode (Bypasses ALL External API Costs)
runTestMode.description: Setting this to true bypasses the DuckDuckGo Search and the OpenAI LLM call, enabling zero-cost testing of the workflow. **DO NOT ENABLE IN PRODUCTION.**
